Rule: Transitioning from Blue-Collar to Professional, White-Collar, or Sales occupations leads to higher income.
Having an Associate's degree can potentially lead to higher income compared to a Bachelor's degree.
Employment in Government sectors can lead to higher income compared to Private sectors.
Being 'Separated' rather than 'Married' can potentially lead to higher income.
Being younger (e.g., 38 years old) leads to higher income compared to being older (e.g., 49 years old).
